Activity: Arrive at the office, coffee, and review schedule.
Check and respond to overnight emails. Prioritize urgent requests.
Review feedback from @ehrv-1 regarding the project overview and FAQs. Incorporate necessary revisions.
Send the revised documents to @trainer-1 for distribution. Confirm the distribution plan.
Meet with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to discuss the influenza data abstraction progress. Address any challenges and provide guidance. @da-1 and @da-2 will also be attending the meeting.
Work with @dba-1 to ensure the database environment is optimized for the influenza data upload. Discuss potential scalability issues.
Create a detailed action plan for resolving the data abstraction challenges identified in the morning meeting.
Communicate the action plan to @ehrdev-1, @ehrdev-2, and @dba-1. Schedule follow-up meetings as needed.

Address any questions or concerns from @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 regarding the data quality assurance plan.

Prepare a summary of the day's activities and plan for tomorrow.
